title: Everything you need to know about CES in 10 questions
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, tech critic Molly Wood faces off against Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson in this special CES-themed Silicon Tally.

Play along at home, below.
description: This week's Silicon Tally is CES themed. How closely have you been following the news?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, January 10, 2014
